microserviceData.systemName: example - SkyPath - REQUIRED for Skypathlog schema
microserviceData.serviceName: example - up-link-api - REQUIRED for Skypathlog schema
microserviceData.podId: The pods id. automaticly created. OVERRIDES WHATEVER YOU WRITE HERE !!! - REQUIRED for Skypathlog schema

skypathMessageId: GUID/UUID for the message in SkyPath - NOT REQUIRED for Skypathlog schema

additionalIds.systemName: example - METEG_SAKNAI (*required for additionalIds object) - NOT REQUIRED for Skypathlog schema
additionalIds.itemId: The item ID as generated in the creating system (*required for additionalIds object) - NOT REQUIRED for Skypathlog schema
additionalIds.systemId: "A unique system code used when reportings the ID to Octopus - NOT REQUIRED for Skypathlog schema

tags: Array of message tags - NOT REQUIRED for Skypathlog schema
